Package com.servers.application.util

Class Json

java.lang.Object
com.servers.application.util.Json
public class Json
extends java.lang.Object
The Json class works with reading and writing Json using an ObjectMapper. Parsed Json String into JsonNodes, which are generic containers of elements inside a Json Stream which can contain various fundamental types (integers, booleans, etc) and complex types like objects and arrays. The JsonNodes are then converted to the Configuration class which stores information the Json provides. The class can also do the reverse, converting a Configuration Object into a JsonNode. It can also the JsonNodes back into a Json String.

    • defaultObjectMapper

      private static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper defaultObjectMapper()
      Initializes an ObjectMapper for the class to utilize, configuring its settings to fail when receiving unknown properties.
      Returns:
      The configured ObjectMapper the class will utilize.

    • parse

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode parse​(java.lang.String JsonSrc) throws java.io.IOException
      Parses the Json string and converts it into a JsonNode to be used in the Configuration class for the Web Server.
      Parameters:
      JsonSrc - The String to be converted into a Json Node.
      Returns:
      JsonNode to used in the Configuration class.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • FromJson

      public static <A> A FromJson​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node, java.lang.Class<A> clazz) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Parses the JSON string into an Object.
      Type Parameters:
      A - The Generic in place of the unknown object return type as it can vary.
      Parameters:
      node - The JSON source which is parsed into a JsonNode
      clazz - The Java Object (Configuration) to parse the Json into an instance of.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • toJson

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode toJson​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Converts the Configuration Object into a JsonNode.
      Parameters:
      obj - The desired class to be converted to. (Configuration)
      Returns:
      Converted Json created from the Object Parameter.

    • stringify

      public static java.lang.String stringify​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Driver method using the GenerateJson method to create a Json String using a JsonNode or Object. This one is not pretty.
      Parameters:
      node - The desired JsonNode to be converted into a Json String.
      Returns:
      A Json String.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • stringifyPretty

      public static java.lang.String stringifyPretty​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Driver method using the GenerateJson method to create a Json String using a JsonNode or Object. This one specifically stringifies the object into a "pretty" structure.
      Parameters:
      node - The desired JsonNode to be converted into a Json String.
      Returns:
      A Json String.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • generateJson

      private static java.lang.String generateJson​(java.lang.Object e, boolean pretty) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Converts JsonNode or any Object into a Json String.
      Parameters:
      e - The Object to be converted into a Json String.
      pretty - Boolean stating whether or not to enable indentation for this generator, using a default pretty printer configured for ObjectMapper.
      Returns:
      The desired Json String.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
